name: pour_it_up
description: MERN stack app aimed at those new found bartenders during the 2020 quarantine lock-down. This app helps in assisting those with drink ingredients, preparations, glass, and more!

scripts.start: if-env SOME_ENV_VAR=some_val ANOTHER_ENV_VAR=another_val && npm run this || npm run that
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
